numeric.name: force_zeros
numeric.doc: if true will force zeroing memories in pcid and emulation

numeric.name: defaults_verify
numeric.doc: if true will test memory defaults are as exepected

table.name: default
table.doc: default values for memories, any mem that is not mentioned will be set to zero

value.name: mode
value.doc: default value will be set according to this mode

value.name: default_get_cb
value.doc: callback to get the default, used in custom modes

value.name: field
value.doc: If field defined - will set just the specified field (all the reset will be set to zero). not relevant for custom modes

sub_module.name: properties
sub_module.doc: used to store information related to soc properties

value.name: suffix
value.doc: used in case the soc property read using suffix method

value.name: num_max
value.doc: max number of index to check in case using suffix_num method

value.name: per_port
value.doc: 1 if the soc property might be read per port

value.name: err_msg
value.doc: detailed error message with instructions what to do instead

feature.name: data_path_hw
feature.doc: If set, indicates data path HW needs to be set

sub_module.name: ha
sub_module.doc: values for sw state and high availability init

numeric.name: warmboot_support
numeric.doc: specify if unit should support wb

numeric.name: sw_state_max_size
numeric.doc: specify the amount of memory (in bytes) preallocated for sw state

numeric.name: cache_enable_all
numeric.doc: if true shadow all cacheable memory

numeric.name: cache_enable_ecc
numeric.doc: if true shadow all cacheable memory which contain ecc field

numeric.name: cache_enable_parity
numeric.doc: if true shadow all cacheable memory which contain parity field

numeric.name: cache_enable_specific
numeric.doc: if true, some specific memory be shadowed

numeric.name: cache_disable_specific
numeric.doc: if true, some specific memory won't be shadowed
